alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 25 at 4:08AM CDT until October 25 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Kansas, including the following county, Sedgwick. * WHEN...Until 800 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 408 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wichita, Derby, Haysville, Downtown Wichita, Eastborough, South Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport, East Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base, West Wichita and Oaklawn.
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown.
